HerRise connects women professionals with mentors, growth programs, and leadership opportunities based on verified skills and experience.
Using AI-driven career mapping, it recommends tailored training paths, networking events, and job matches while tracking diversity and inclusion progress for organizations.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Women remain underrepresented in leadership and technical roles due to limited mentorship access, biased career growth systems, and lack of visibility for skills and achievements. This gender gap reduces innovation, economic diversity, and equitable opportunity in the workforce.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: HerRise - Career Pathway Platform for Women in Tech and Leadership
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

App Engine Studio - build mentorship matching and career pathway modules.

Employee Center Pro - centralize resources, workshops, and leadership opportunities.

Performance Analytics - measure organizational gender balance and growth metrics.

IntegrationHub - connect to LinkedIn Learning or external training APIs.

Now Learning / Knowledge Base - deliver curated leadership content and success stories.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • AI/ML engine for recommendation and career mapping.
  • HR and Learning Management System (LMS) integration.
  • Data analytics API for diversity tracking.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Encouraging participation from both mentors and mentees.
  • Avoiding algorithmic bias in recommendation systems.
  • Sustaining engagement beyond onboarding.
